svg.script: // My corresponding testcase uses an image with no preserveAspectRatio on // its root node. So, the testcase's final bonus "defer" grid-entry will // fall back on the preserveAspectRatio value that comes along with // "defer" (which is "xMinYMin slice" in this case). var grid = generateSymbolGrid("blueRect10x10.svg#root", 40, 20, "xMinYMin slice"); grid.setAttribute("transform", "translate(10, 10)"); document.documentElement.appendChild(grid);
